quote: Life is about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: What mind can conceive, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Strive not for success, but rather value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I took the road less traveled; difference made.
author: Robert Frost

quote: My success: I never gave or took excuses.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: You miss all the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: I failed repeatedly; that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Deciding to act is hard, the rest is tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Every strike brings me closer to a home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Life happens while making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Explore, Dream, Discover. Don't live with regrets.
author: Mark Twain

quote: People give up power thinking they have none.
author: Alice Walker

quote: The mind is everything. You become what you think.
author: Buddha

quote: Best time to plant a tree? Now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates
